definition: heddle (device to form warp in weaving textiles)/Taiwan pr. [zong4]
to sum up/to put together/Taiwan pr. [zong4]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗

sentences.english: The products made from the two appropriative resins show excellent comprehensive performance.
sentences.chinese: 由該專用樹脂製得的製品具有優良的綜合性能。

sentences.english: Substance of critical thinking is evaluation and comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 批判性思維的實質是評價性和綜合性。

sentences.english: ABS resin is a kind of thermoplastic resin with excellent allround properties.
sentences.chinese: ABS樹脂是一種綜合性能優異的熱塑性樹脂。

sentences.english: Terminology is a complex cross-disciplinary science.
sentences.chinese: 術語學是一門綜合性的應用學科。

sentences.english: A comprehensive country club is built as entertainment facility.
sentences.chinese: 文化娛樂建有綜合性鄉村俱樂部。

sentences.english: Prices for synthetic bristles haven't changed much all these years.
sentences.chinese: 價格爲綜合性的剛毛沒有整這些數年多改變。

sentences.english: This is a super high rise building of integral functions, but most parts of it are used for residential apartments.
sentences.chinese: 雍景臺大廈是一棟以住宅爲主的超高層綜合性大廈。

sentences.english: Some illustrations of an integrated front panel are provided below.
sentences.chinese: 綜合性前面板如下圖所示。

sentences.english: Set up a local comprehensive HIV/AIDS occupational post-exposure emergency network.
sentences.chinese: 建立綜合性地方艾滋病職業暴露後應急處理網絡。

sentences.english: Penstock fabrication and installation is a comprehensive construction technology.
sentences.chinese: 壓力管道製作與安裝是一項綜合性施工技術。

sentences.english: The tractor shape design is a highly integrated cross-disciplinary.
sentences.chinese: 拖拉機形態設計是一項高度綜合性的交叉學科。

sentences.english: Research on error analysis of machining of digital tooth surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 數字化齒面展成加工齒廓誤差綜合性分析。

sentences.english: The tests showed emulsifier effect markedly on comprehensive performance of core-shell emulsion and coating film.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，乳化劑對乳液及塗料綜合性能影響顯著。

sentences.english: However, when the weft density of the decating blanket should be increased to a proper extent, or otherwise its combined properties will decrease.
sentences.chinese: 當緯密較大時增加緯密會使蒸呢布的綜合性能下降。

sentences.english: The complete success restaurant is a comprehensive hotel.
sentences.chinese: 滿堂紅酒樓是一家綜合性酒店。

sentences.english: The grain-leaf ratio is a comprehensive trait estimating photosynthetic productivity of per unit leaf area.
sentences.chinese: 粒葉比是衡量單位葉面積光合生產力的綜合性狀。

definition: privately run (i.e. by a company, not the state)
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
